title: Update page layout with black background, orange/white text, and harmonious logo integration

requirements.text: Change the page background color to black across all pages and components

quotes: MUDE O LAYOUTE DA PAGINA PARA UM FUNDO PRETO

acceptanceCriteria: All page backgrounds are black (#000000 or equivalent)
Background color is consistent across all routes and components
Dark mode CSS variables are updated to use black background

requirements.text: Update text colors throughout the application to use orange and white color scheme, with orange for headings/accents and white for body text

quotes: CORES DE LETRAS LARANJA E BRANCO

acceptanceCriteria: Primary headings and accent text use orange color
Body text and general content use white color
Text maintains sufficient contrast against black background for accessibility
Color scheme is applied consistently across all components

requirements.text: Integrate the user-provided logo into the page layout harmoniously without disrupting the existing layout or mobile responsiveness

quotes: COLOQUE ESTA LOGO NA PAGINA DE FORMA ARMONICA SEM PREJUDICAR O LAYOUT OU A ABERTURA DA PAGINA PARA DISPOSIVIVOS MOVEIS

acceptanceCriteria: Logo is placed in a prominent but non-intrusive location (e.g., header)
Logo scales appropriately for mobile devices
Logo does not break or interfere with existing navigation or content layout
Logo maintains aspect ratio and quality across all screen sizes

requirements.text: Update Tailwind CSS configuration and global styles to support the new black background with orange and white color palette
acceptanceCriteria: CSS variables are updated with new color values
Tailwind theme configuration includes orange and white as primary colors
All components respect the new color system

constraints: Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication components (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts)
Do not edit components in frontend/src/components/ui directory
Maintain mobile responsiveness for all layout changes
Preserve all existing functionality while applying visual updates
nonGoals: Changing the functionality of any existing features
Modifying backend logic or data structures
Adding new pages or navigation items

required: Logo image suitable for header placement with transparent background, optimized for both light and dark backgrounds (logo.dim_200x80.png)
